query: Haldon Heroic gravel race Haldon Forest

videos.title: Haldon Heroic Gravel Sportive
videos.description: The Haldon Heroic Gravel ride from Sportiva Events. It showcases the best gravel trails & bridleways in the Haldon Forest Area, Devon, UK

videos.title: Haldon Forest - Off Piste - Kiddens Trail - Blue Trail - Enduro MTB - Devon
videos.description:
In this video, I am at Haldon Forest Park and I am going to riding some of the off-piste trails. I will give you full instructions on how to find them and below is my Strava link to the route. Hope you enjoy it.  

Strava: https://strava.app.link/BsPndTqzBbb

Music: Royalty-Free Music from Ben sounds

My MTB Gear:
GT Force Carbon Expert Mountain Bike 2020 Moss Green
Bike:https://www.paulscycles.co.uk/5289/products/gt-force-carbon-expert-mountain-bike-2020-moss-green.aspx

Bike 
Marin B-17 TWO
Marin Bikes: https://www.marinbikes.com/gb/bike-archive/bikes/2018-b-17-2

Rucksack
Camelbak Mule 3L
Camelbak: https://www.camelbak.com/en/packs/R01132--MULE_100_oz_Hydration_Pack?color=39bf23b5db5c49fbb8ac1beb6bf8a041

Front Mud Guard
Mucky Nutz Mud Guard Blue and Black
Amazon: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Mucky-Nutz-Bender-Mountain-Mudguard/dp/B074FW79FN

Chest Mount Cam
Go Pro Hero 7 Black
Go Pro: https://gopro.com/en/gb/shop/cameras/hero7-black/CHDHX-701-master.html?shopping=noredirect&gclid=Cj0KCQjwtLT1BRD9ARIsAMH3BtXnmFZwmentsT9IJLKY5EsX6eNT1ZZ62Uw--2ZSIMCMh-0YneCmsx8aAnZ7EALw_wcB&gclsrc=aw.ds

Head Camera
Go Pro MAX
Go Pro: https://gopro.com/en/gb/shop/cameras/max/CHDHZ-201-master.html

Chest Mount
Go Pro Chesty
Go Pro: https://gopro.com/en/gb/shop/mounts/chesty/AGCHM-001.html

Second Camera
iPhone 8 Plus
Amazon: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Apple-iPhone-Plus-64GB-Gold/dp/B075VW63K2

Third Camera
Motorola One Vision
Amazon: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Motorola-CinemaVision-display-Sim-Free-Smartphone-Sapphire-Blue/dp/B07R8Y3J38

Gorilla Mount
Joby 3K Pro
Joby: https://joby.com/uk-en/gorillapod-3k-pro-jb01566-config/

Gorilla Mount 2
Tripod
Amazon: https://www.amazon.co.uk/JIUY-Octopus-Flexible-Quick-Release-Smartphone/dp/B082S9BLPD/ref=sr_1_1?crid=3RXG2WCOEPXKU&dchild=1&keywords=gorilla+tripod&qid=1588441492&sprefix=gorilla+t%2Caps%2C149&sr=8-1&swrs=CB4AB5C9494C18C23BC3167A56C17DF6

videos.title: We Accidently Entered a Gravel Race!
videos.description:
In looking for an event for this weekend, we found what we though was a nice looking sportive in Haldon Forest. Only upon entering, we realized we'd signed up for a race!! Once we'd stopped laughing, we roped in a couple more people to share our pain in the Haldon Heroics event, chasing shadows around Devon. Our main goal though was to just enjoy it and try not to finish last!

Created with Wondershare Filmora

My Strava  for those wanting to see the routes we ride is
https://www.strava.com/athletes/2357668

The Official Climbs Website for all the climbs I am collecting -https://www.100climbs.co.uk/


My equipment for list for filming :
iPhone 13 Pro(4K enabled)
Bitplay iPhone camera case
Front camera is IPhone 4K 
Shure MV88 microphone
Tascam DR10 Lavalier Microphone
GoPro Hero 9
Insta360 X3


My Instagram is:

Personal Instagram is CyclingDarren37

Follow me on Twitter @dazza3740

Follow me on Zwift Darren Phillips (YT)

If you want to join any of our rides, send me a message

If you have any questions, I will be in the YouTube comments replying

Contact us on darren.phillipsyt@gmail.com

Affiliate links
Insta360 Camera's 

https://www.insta360.com/sal/one_r?insrc=INRFV98

videos.title: I'm definitely NOT racing gravel
videos.description:
#notarace

Haldon Heroic https://sportivaevents.co.uk/events/haldon-heroic/


Thanks for the invite Ben, if you’d like to check out any more South West gravel, dirt, off-road and triathlon events, check out the website: https://sportivaevents.co.uk/


My SPONSORS:

https://www.marinbikes.com
https://www.smithoptics.com
https://rouvy.com
https://wildernesstrailbikes.com

30 days free on ROUVY - https://rouvy.com/intro/influencer-juliet-elliott


My COACH:
https://www.trainsharpcycling.co.uk

My STRENGTH & CONDITIONING partner:
https://www.everathlete.fit

DISCOUNTS on my fave stuff:
A free month of WHOOP: join.whoop.com/JULIET
20% off the cosiest camp blankets: https://voited.co.uk CODE: FEELGOODJULIET  

+=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=+

If you're after my routes, they're always on Strava
https://www.strava.com/athletes/julietelliottuk

Stuff I use:
Dynaplug Tubeless Repair: https://amzn.to/3kf5vhv
Sealant: https://amzn.to/41bL6uk
Mini Powerbank: https://amzn.to/3IG45pB
Main Camera: https://amzn.to/3kfcF5m
Mic: https://amzn.to/3k82DmJ
Camera Strap: https://amzn.to/3YSJunJ
Action Cam: https://amzn.to/41dl0Hd


+=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=++=+=+=+

F O L L O W  M E

Instagram: http://instagram.com/julietelliott
Website: http://www.bikes-n-stuff.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/juliet.elliott
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/_julietelliott

videos.title: Haldon Forest | Gravel Bike on the MTB Trails
videos.description:
On this cycling adventure, I travel from Exeter to Haldon Forest, where I ride some gravel roads and MTB trails on the specialized creo. My observations are the subject of this ride. So come along and enjoy another great cycling adventure. 

Disclaimer: This is not a sponsored video.

Thank you for watching! 

If you enjoyed this video then please Like, Comment and Subscribe to my channel for more cycling adventures! Be the first to know when a new video is released by turning on all notifications. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSN4p1Cn_nN_I5z4n0iBgFQ?sub_confirmation=1  

Social Media: 

Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/electricbikerider

Strava Club: https://www.strava.com/clubs/electricbikerider

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/electricbikerideruk

Buy Me a Coffee: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/electricbikerider


Products I use: 

E Bike: Specialized Turbo Creo SL Comp Carbon 
Vlogging Camera GoPro Hero 10
Tyres: WTB Expanse 32c
Mudguards: Specialized Dry-Tech
Pedals: Speedplay
GPS: Wahoo Roam V2
Mount: Specialized Stem Accessory 
Rear Camera, Radar and Tail Light: Garmin Varia RCT715
Front Camera and Light: Cycliq FLY12 Sport
Saddle Bag: Lezyne Road Caddy
Top Tube Bag: Tailfin 0.8ltr
Water Bottle: Fidlock System 
Bell: Knog Oi 

#cycling #eroadbike #ebike #bike #unitedkingdom #devon #exeter #devontourism #vlog #cyclingvlog #dailyobservations #like #comment #subscribe #4k #edit
